languages.text: {n}Рисунок на палубе мостика выглядит довольно свежим. И вы точно не распоряжались наносить его. Это — причудливая вязь незнакомых вам символов.{/n}
{n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рисунок на переборке мостика выглядит довольно свежим. И вы точно не распоряжались наносить его. Это — причудливая вязь незнакомых вам символов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}
{n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}
{n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}
{n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}

languages.text: {n}舰桥舱壁上的画是看起来是最近画上去的。很显然，这并不是你下令这么做的，你也从来没见过画上那些古怪的符号。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥舱壁上的画是看起来是最近画上去的。很显然，这并不是你下令这么做的，你也从来没见过画上那些古怪的符号。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブリッジの隔壁に描かれた絵は比較的最近描かれたもののようだが、あなたが指示したものではない。あなたはこの気まぐれなシンボルに見覚えはなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジの隔壁に描かれた絵は比較的最近描かれたもののようだが、あなたが指示したものではない。あなたはこの気まぐれなシンボルに見覚えはなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El dibujo de la mampara del puente es nuevo, y sabes que no has ordenado que se pinte. No reconoces los pintorescos símbolos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El dibujo de la mampara del puente es nuevo, y sabes que no has ordenado que se pinte. No reconoces los pintorescos símbolos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le dessin sur la cloison de la passerelle semble relativement récent et ce n'est certainement pas vous qui avez demandé à ce qu'il soit peint. Les symboles fantaisistes ne vous évoquent absolument rien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le dessin sur la cloison de la passerelle semble relativement récent et ce n'est certainement pas vous qui avez demandé à ce qu'il soit peint. Les symboles fantaisistes ne vous évoquent absolument rien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Zeichnung auf der Brücke sieht relativ frisch aus, aber du hast für sie sicher keinen Befehl gegeben. Die sonderbaren Symbole kommen dir nicht bekannt vor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zeichnung auf der Brücke sieht relativ frisch aus, aber du hast für sie sicher keinen Befehl gegeben. Die sonderbaren Symbole kommen dir nicht bekannt vor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geminin bölme panelindeki çizim, yakın zamanda yapılmış gibi duruyor. Üstelik böyle bir şeyin yapılmasını emretmediğine eminsin. Tuhaf semboller sana tanıdık gelmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing on the bulkhead of the bridge looks relatively recent, and you certainly gave no order for it to be done. You do not recognise the whimsical symbols.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Geminin bölme panelindeki çizim, yakın zamanda yapılmış gibi duruyor ve böyle bir şeyin yapılması için emir vermediğine eminsin. Rastgele görünümlü semboller sana tanıdık gelmiyor.{/n}
